column4: does anyone know if its possible to install the 32 bit version of Ubuntu over the 64 bit version without having to reformat the HD?
Im sorry, I meant the entire HD including Ubuntu itself..
I dont wanna lose the way I have all the settings set at and I cant use Opera since Im running the 64 bit version :-(
there's a fix/hack/thing to get such things as java and flash working on 64-bit machines
